casebody.data:
Thursday, March 20, 1997

MOTION DOCKET

96-876. Gallia Cty. Veterans Serv. Comm. v. Gallia Cty. Bd. of Commrs.

Gallia App. No. 95CA13. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Gallia County. Upon consideration of the motion of amicus curiae, Ohio State Association of Veterans Service Commissions, to participate in oral argument,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion to participate in oral argument be, and hereby is, granted, and Ohio State Association of Veterans Service Commissions is to share the time allotted to appellant.
